title: Helping Community College Students Graduate
teaser: About half of all college students in the United States go to community colleges and only a third of those […]
description: About half of all college students in the United States go to community colleges and only a third of those […]
contentencoded:
About half of all college students in the United States go to community colleges and only a third of those students graduate. But administrators at the City University of New York, or CUNY have found a way to get more community college students to graduate faster and be better prepared for the workforce.


Guest: Donna Linderman, Associate Dean for Student Success Initiatives at CUNY, and the Executive Director for the ASAP program.
